__e: But I didn't kill Troy and his wife.
I've had a chance to watch your work, Dr. Troy, but I've seen the results.
I think my friend Troy might have a drug problem.
That said, and as hard as it may seem, right now, Troy needs to show he cares.
Exactly. The killer found him and shot him in the head while Troy was on the inside looking out.
When Troy left last night, I knew where he was going - the same place I used to go when I had a problem I needed to talk about.
Because good old Troy's a decent, stand-up guy simply not capable of doing something so horrible, right?
Troy's mom died when he was really young, and so he was really close with his dad, but he was afraid to come out to him until we got together, and then he just didn't want to hide me, so...
Dr. Troy could I ask you for one more favor?
"Very carefully, Troy. I think I know what you're going to say."
And, Troy, I don't know what to say.
